text: Richard J. Brooker (1954 - 8 April 2013) was an English stuntman and actor. He is best known for his role in Friday the 13th Part III as Jason Voorhees. Brooker was born in 1954 in London, England. Brooker died on April 8, 2013 in the United Kingdom from unknown causes, aged 59. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1954 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Actors from London Category:English businesspeople Category:English movie actors Category:English movie directors Category:English movie producers Category:Stunt performers
title: Richard Brooker
